page.title: 16WORK IN LYDFORD
page.content: My dad works for British Rail.He works at Meldon quarry which is near to Okehampton.He gets up at 6.00 (a.m) and he leaves half an hour later.He goes to the car park and gets his van.On the way to work he picks up some of his mates.When he gets to work he has breakfast.He then starts work. He either uses the Plant Machine or the crusher.These are used to crush stone for the railway. He gets back from work at about 4.30 (p.m)When he gets back he is hot so mum makes him a cup of tea.At tea time he tells us what has happened that day at work.
